jump_scares.spoiler: The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
Hank jumps at Abby from the side
After Hank says “you should get that thing off him before he floats away” there is a car horn blast and a cut to Hank firing a gun
As Abby is pulling the hammock there is a cut to Hank falling out of bed
The trap Hank set suddenly goes off
As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground
While Hank is singing, the monster suddenly lunges at him
There is a sudden growl
The creature growls and comes forward quickly
The cop is impaled from behind
The creature breaks through the window

movies.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for Blood Orchid

jump_scares.spoiler: A monkey abruptly leaps onto Gail
A monkey leaps onto the table suddenly
Ben was pulled underwater by an anaconda
Ben was attacked by an anaconda
The corpse of Livingston popped in the shot
Tran falls into a hole underwater
An anaconda attacks Cole from the back

movies.title: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made.

jump_scares.spoiler: Dennis bites Paul on the hand
Paul leaves the camp fire and is startled by Grim and his dog
Jeff opens the door and the infected man is standing outside
Bert jumps out at Marcy in the kitchen
There is a gunshot as the scene abruptly cuts to Bert and Jeff
A man puts his hand on Paul’s shoulder while he is looking into a bedroom
Karen vomits blood over the windscreen
Paul sees a deer on the road
Paul dreams about happier times with Karen, the dream is interrupted by an image of Karen’s horribly diseased face. [Video]
Jeff is shot repeatedly
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
Will turns on the camera light and a monster is standing right in front of him
There is suddenly a loud bang in the middle of a conversation
Adam grabs his boot from the grave and stands up to reveal Dekker standing right behind him
While Adam and Dekker are arguing, Will points the camera downwards and a monster runs straight at him
There is suddenly an incredibly loud screech that wakes up Adam and his wife
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
The corpse comes alive for a second facing the soldier
One of the monsters attacks a soldier
The camera suddenly cuts to a monster
A monster suddenly turns around facing the camera
The monster in the corner that disappeared reappears from the side
A wolf suddenly appears in front of Dan
Gretel’s mother suddenly hits the table with an axe
A crow flies past Gretel
A loud change to the laughing Gretel could frighten very sensitive viewers
A cut to Hansel in the witch’s house follows. There is loud music and the witch suddenly stands in the left corner
After the witch points with her finger a silhouette runs past the door. In addition there is a loud scream
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie
A zombie appears in front of Ann as she flees the house
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
A truck drives by startling Rachel after she says “everything is inside”
The injured man grabs Louis around the arm as he wheels him into theater
The lights flicker and the previously dead man is suddenly sitting up on the bed behind Louis
Louis sits in his car lost in thought  as he goes to drive off a truck suddenly races past in front of him
Victor’s hand suddenly reaches out to grab Louis around the ankle as he climbs the pile of branches
During a flashback, young Rachel is startled as her disfigured sister suddenly falls down the dumbwaiter shaft
Louis opens the closet revealing Church who screeches at him
Ellie is suddenly scratched by the cat as she tries to remove something from its fur
Church screeches at Louis from behind
After Louis walks through a door and finds himself back outside in the woods, a truck horn suddenly blares
Rachel has a hallucination where the medicine cabinet in the bathroom transforms into the dumbwaiter shaft which her sister once again falls through
After Louis finds the mask, Ellie appears behind him and says “Daddy”
Jud spots Church in the hallway and suddenly Ellie stabs him in the ankle
After waking from a nightmare Rachel looks up to find Gage safe. Suddenly Ellie leaps at her with a knife
Church jumps down the tree and yowls at Louis
Victor suddenly grabs Louis on the shoulder
While Louis is lying in bed, there is a loud noise and Victor is suddenly standing in the doorway
Louis turns around and Victor is now standing right by the bed
Victor grabs Louis from behind
Church yowls at Louis in the garage
A dead rat drops into the bathtub while Louis is in it
Victor appears beside Rachel
A face appears out of a rock pile and comes towards Louis
A ball bounces across the room
Church yowls
Church yowls and jumps down behind Rachel
Rachel’s dead body drops down from a rope. [Video]
The truck hits a naked man
The man starts moving
A sudden music cue as blood begins to pour from a man’s face
The man is grabbed by the head
A snowball hits the window
A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
The title card appears abruptly on the screen accompanied by a scream. [Video]
The gas station attendant suddenly appears in front of Holden
Holden removes a painting from the wall to reveal a window with Dana standing behind it
The cellar door opens by itself
Jules is stabbed in the hand while having sex
An agitated Curt suddenly appears beside Marty
Something punches through the cabin wall
A zombie breaks through the window and grabs Marty
A zombie hand comes through the window in Dana’s room
Holden is stabbed in the back by a zombie
Holden is stabbed in the neck while driving
The father zombie bangs his chain down in front of Dana
Dana puts her face up to a window and a werewolf lunges at the glass from the other side. [Video]
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, a man suddenly sits up in his bed
Accompanied by another sound effect, the camera cuts to a close up of a skull covered in worms
A burnt hand reaches out to grab one of the doctors. [Video]
Sally opens the shower curtain and screams

A bird flies out as Todd opens a door
A man in a mask jumps out (as a prank), scaring the group. [Video]

Some dirt falls down the mine-shaft startling Todd
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, Todd sees a corpse. [Video]
Cropsy’s disfigured face suddenly appears on screen (once again accompanied by a loud sound effect. [Video]
Several short sharp flashbacks over the next 20 seconds may startle some viewers
Cropsy leaps up to attack Todd and Alfred. [Video]
A man bangs on the car window, startling Sara
During a dream, Sara unzips a tent to reveal a girl however the girl’s face suddenly turns demonic
Sara removes a sheet from a body and sees a decayed corpse
An elderly lady suddenly lunges at Sara

Sara turns around and sees a girl watching her
A skeletal figure appears behind Sara

Sara looks through a reel of photos and a man’s face suddenly pops up in front of one of the images

Hands reach out of the ground to grab Sara

There is an explosion from the wreckage of the aircraft
A spear pierces through Kara’s neck
One of the tribesmen grabs Justine around the leg

As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out
When Thomas turns around, two people in cape stand behind him

The monster breaks through the window and pulls Kathy out of the car
The ambulance medic falls onto the windscreen
A hand reaches into the ambulance and pulls the driver out
The monster slams into the side of the ambulance as it drives away

The monster drops down in front of Kathy and Lizzy
The creature suddenly tackles Kathy
The creature roars at Lizzy as she approaches it
